attributes.action: England deserves a referendum on whether it wants to leave the UK.
attributes.additional_details: History is history, who is to blame, who invaded who whatever, that is the past, England should have a voice just as directly as the rest of our nations. Why should England want to be part of nations that clearly seem to dislike us enough to constantly, blame us for what suits them? Why should us English want to stick around if our neighbours no longer like us enough to be in a union with us? It's time for us to think of ourselves what we want, we can end all referendums by divorcing ourselves.
attributes.background: Those of us who live in England face constant criticism from the rest of our unions established politicians, when it suits them. As they become more vocal with their often opportunist and sometimes down right lies. If we're  such a problem to the rest of our union, then we should put an end to it.
